original_text: Lord God, please do the things that you have promised to do for me, your servant, and for my family. Continue to do for ever what you have promised to do.
korean_text: 여호와 하나님이여 이제 주의 종과 종의 집에 대하여 말씀하신 것을 영원히 세우셨사오며 말씀하신 대로 행하사

sentences.original_text: Lord God, please do the things
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님, 부디 그 일들을 행하시옵소서

sentences.original_text: that you have promised to do for me
what you have promised to do.
